headline: Canopy Growth Is Making Big Moves In Its Cannabis Business
summary: Canopy Growth improved liquidity after refinancing and equity raises, adds MTL Cannabis, trades low PTBV and high EBITDA multiple. Read why CGC stock is a hold.

headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Constellation Brands (STZ) After Its Prolonged Share Price Slump?
summary: If you are wondering whether Constellation Brands is offering good value right now, you are not alone. Many investors are asking the same question as the share price shifts around key levels. The stock last closed at US$147.00, with a 4.1% return over the past week, a 0.3% decline over the past month, and returns of 4.1% year to date, a 17.1% decline over 1 year, a 30.9% decline over 3 years, and a 27.5% decline over 5 years.
